review_blob:
FLAVOR is the operative word for this IPA. You expect the bitterness, but the combination of malt, some sweetness ( I did not think as sweet as some say) and all of the aroma accompanying this array of hops and brewing create make for a new favorite IPA selection. Apricot is definitely the color coming through. 

Glad my first try was a tapped keg - will enjoy and share with others over the coming weeks :)

Probably what Budwiser tasted like before they started filling with rice. 
Nice lager for summer drinking.
